metadata.title: CVE-2021-4052 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in web apps in Google Chrome prior to 96.0.4664.93 allowedan attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
